sentences.sContent: It says that on average, you should be around 20.
sentences.sContent_eng: It says that on average, you should be around 20.
sentences.sCn: 它表示的是平均值，应该在20左右。

sentences.sContent: You are only on this earth for around 80 years, on average, if you are lucky, so why not try and experience as much as you can before you die.
sentences.sContent_eng: You are only on this earth for around 80 years, on average, if you are lucky, so why not try and experience as much as you can before you die.
sentences.sCn: 平均来说，如果你幸运的话，你仅仅会在这地球活上大概80年。 所以为什么不试着在你死之前经历尽可能多的经历呢。

sentences.sContent: We might not have the best scores on average, but our institutions have some of the brightest minds in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: We might not have the best scores on average, but our institutions have some of the brightest minds in the world.
sentences.sCn: 也许平均下来我们得不到最好的分数，但是我们的研究院有着世界上最聪明的头脑。
